net.proteusframework.data.http

Interface URLGenerator


  • public interface URLGenerator
    General purpose URI generator for various types of objects that can be used to create URIs (e.g. FileEntity, FactoryBasedResource, Link).
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Create URL for the FactoryResource.

      Create a URL to the specified Link.
      ResponseURL createURL(RequestPath requestPath)
      Create a URL to the specified RequestPath.
      ResponseURL createURL(String uri)
      Create a URL.
      ResponseURL createURL(URI uri)
      Create a URI from a URI possibly converting it to a CDN URL.
      FileEntity getFileEntity(FactoryResourceConfiguration factoryResourceConfiguration)
      Get the FileEntity from the resource identifier if it identifies a FileEntity.

        Create URL for the FactoryResource.

      • createURL

        ResponseURL createURL(FactoryResourceConfiguration factoryResourceConfiguration)
               throws IllegalArgumentException
        Create URL for the FactoryResource.
        Parameters:
        factoryResourceConfiguration - the factory resource identifier.
        Returns:
        the URL.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the configuration does not point to a resource.

        Create URL for the FactoryResource.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the URL.

      • createURL

        ResponseURL createURL(Link link)
        Create a URL to the specified Link.
        Parameters:
        link - a link with a URI.
        Returns:
        the URL.

      • createURL

        ResponseURL createURL(RequestPath requestPath)
               throws IllegalArgumentException
        Create a URL to the specified RequestPath.
        Parameters:
        requestPath - the request path.
        Returns:
        the URL.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the RequestPath URI is invalid.

      • createURL

        ResponseURL createURL(String uri)
               throws IllegalArgumentException
        Create a URL.
        Parameters:
        uri - the uri.
        Returns:
        creates a new Link and returns the value from calling createURL(Link).
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the URI is invalid.
        See Also:
        createURL(Link)

      • createURL

        ResponseURL createURL(URI uri)
        Create a URI from a URI possibly converting it to a CDN URL.
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI.
        Returns:
        the URL.

      • getFileEntity

        @Nullable
FileEntity getFileEntity(@Nullable
                                   FactoryResourceConfiguration factoryResourceConfiguration)
        Get the FileEntity from the resource identifier if it identifies a FileEntity.
        Parameters:
        factoryResourceConfiguration - the identifier.
        Returns:
        the file or null.

      • setHostname

        void setHostname(Hostname hostname)
        Set the hostname.
        Parameters:
        hostname - the hostname.

      • setOutputHostname

        void setOutputHostname(boolean outputHostname)
        Set whether the output of the hostname should be forced. If true, a protocol relative hostname will be added unless setSecure(Boolean) is set. If the secure flag is set, then a protocol will also be output.
        Parameters:
        outputHostname - the output hostname flag.

      • setSecure

        void setSecure(@Nullable
               Boolean secure)
        Set the secure request flag.
        Parameters:
        secure - the secure flag.

      • setUseContentDeliveryNetwork

        void setUseContentDeliveryNetwork(boolean useContentDeliveryNetwork)
        Set the use content delivery network flag. Defaults to false.
        Parameters:
        useContentDeliveryNetwork - true to use a content delivery network if possible; false to generate a URL off of the current / specified domain.
